About.paragraph_1: Currently, focus on full stack development.
About.paragraph_2: My name is Alef and I am passionate about new technologies. I recognize the importance of technologies already consolidated in the market, but I always make room for something new. I started in the area at the end of 2020, studying the fundamentals of web development.
About.paragraph_3: I am currently studying Systems Analysis and Development (ASD) and focusing on expanding my skills.

Experience.text: I am a Freelance Developer passionate about technology, always seeking creative and effective solutions for various challenges. With a constant focus on simplicity and functionality, I work to create intuitive interfaces that provide the best user experience.
Experience.paragraph_1: Additionally, I have experience in developing robust APIs that ensure efficient communication between client-side and database.
Experience.paragraph_2: Although my previous projects have been aimed at enhancing my skills, I am excited to apply my knowledge in a professional environment and contribute to innovative and impactful solutions.
Experience.paragraph_3: Currently, I am looking to expand my professional experience within a development team.
